submission:
class Solution(object):
    def countOfPairs(self, nums):
        n = len(nums)
        m = max(nums) + 1

        MOD = int(1e9) + 7

        dp = [[0]*m for _ in range(n)]
        pr = [[0]*m for _ in range(n)]

        for u in range(nums[0]+ 1):
            dp[0][u] = 1
            pr[0][u] = dp[0][u] + (pr[0][u-1] if u > 0 else 0)

        
        for i in range(1,n):
            for u in range(nums[i] + 1):
                v = nums[i] - u

                dp[i][u] = pr[i-1][min(u,nums[i-1] - v)]
                pr[i][u] = dp[i][u] + (pr[i][u-1] if u > 0 else 0)

                dp[i][u] %= MOD
                pr[i][u] %= MOD

        return sum(dp[n-1][u] for u in range(m)) % MOD
